name: Disenchanter
description: Adds cube recipes for disenchanting and upgrading items. Disenchanting converts any item to a non-magic version of it. This can be an ethereal or regular white item. Upgrading increases the quality to Exceptional or Elite. By default, you need one jewel or ring to convert an item, but you can change the required ingredient in the config.
author: erSch

config.name: Item to use to upgrade
config.description: You can choose an item other than a jewel to use in the recipe instead.

config.name: Upgrade Quality
config.description: Basic (normal), exceptional (nightmare) ore elite (hell) item quality

config.name: Free Upgrade
config.description: Does not consume the item, when upgrading.

config.name: Item to use to disenchant (non-ethereal)
config.description: You can choose an item other than a ring to use in the recipe instead.

config.name: Item to use to disenchant (ethereal)
config.description: You can choose an item other than a ring to use in the recipe instead.

config.name: Free Disenchant
config.description: If enabled, the recipe gives you another helper item (ring, amulet etc.) of the same type, when disenchanting. Does not work with charms.

config.name: Enable recipe to copy jewels
config.description: Enables the recipe to copy a jewel. Put it into the cube and transform to get another random jewel.

config.name: Enable recipe to create jewels
config.description: Enables the recipe create a random jewel from a scroll of town portal.
